Scene:
The Town of Shiga
(Shiga no sato / 志賀の里)

Play: The Story of Priest Roben (良弁杉由来)

Production: April 1976

Toyotake Shimatayū VIII (豊竹嶋大夫 (八))



Shamisen Players:
